website_summaries.verdict: One of the best styling hair dryers that is more budget-friendly than premium options.
pros: Uses titanium, ionic, and ceramic technologies
Comes with three temperature and two speed settings that are all accessible from the handle
Heats up fast for quick styling
Attachments include a concentrator for straight hairstyles and a diffuser
cons: Difficult to pack up and carry around without sacrificing space

customer_reviews.title: starsGreat dryer!
customer_reviews.text: Great hairdryer! This dryer dries my hair in 3-4 minutes, where my old dryer took 10-15 and I usually gave up and left the house with wet ends. There are two speed settings (this is good so that I don't blow my two year old away when she wants to use mommy' hairdryer!) and three heat settings, one of which is actually cool- which is nice since you don't have to hold down a button for it. (Although I believe there is still a "cool blast" button.). All in all, this dryer was a great purchase, and was offered at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: steve braverman

customer_reviews.title: 3 heat settings and 3 speeds plus cool shot gives me more options
customer_reviews.text: I'm a curly girl who is always in search of a way to minimize frizz. This dryer produced less frizz than my previous dryer (CHI). 3 heat settings and 3 speeds plus cool shot gives me more options. I primarily use mine with a bonnet attachment. LOVE IT! Can't wait to try a blow out style.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: An ok hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer looks stylish. Lightweight. My hair is a little over my shoulder and it will take over 5 minutes to get it maybe 2/3 dry. I don't have more patience to completely dry my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: short cord
customer_reviews.text: Dryer works fine. The only problem I have is that the cord is short and keeps coming out of the wall while I am drying my hair.
customer_reviews.author: timmel

customer_reviews.title: Good value for a good dryer
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why there are so many poor reviews - I use this at least 4 times a week and it still works great! Plus the sparkles are just fun!
customer_reviews.author: Kali Jones

customer_reviews.title: works well but very underpowered
customer_reviews.text: The dryer works but it is seriously underpowered. On the highest speed a decent personal fan probably beat it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Bleiweiss

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: This dryer suited my needs. Not too small, not too big. It does a good job drying my hair and not making it frizzy.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I use it for defusing my curls almost every day. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointed in this product. Doesn't have very good drying power and mine broke pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 5 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Mine wasn’t working correctly from the start. It has a low and high speed setting but it only operates on low. If I switched the button to high, speed didn’t change. I’ve owned it for a little over a month now and it won’t even turn on. Wish I could return it but my return window is closed.
customer_reviews.author: alison obermeyer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: Well, it looks pretty, but will not work anymore after only 3 months and I was NOT using it on a daily base.
customer_reviews.author: Katharina A.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The minute my daughter plugged it in it sparked and had a burning scent!!!
customer_reviews.author: hbarna

customer_reviews.title: Does not get "hot" enough
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the hotness of this hair dryer. It does not get very hot
customer_reviews.author: lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Eh.
customer_reviews.text: I dont recommend if you have long hair it will get sucked in through the back and power isnt high enough. Pretty color though
customer_reviews.author: Cellie Richard

customer_reviews.title: Love this, it has 10 times more flow then ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this, it has 10 times more flow then my old one! Very pretty design as well! Very pleased it dries my hair quick!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Sokol

customer_reviews.title: Specs should be mentioned clearly
customer_reviews.text: Although the product has international shipping, check for the voltage difference which is not clearly stated. Landed up wasting money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice light dryer
customer_reviews.text: I like this pretty dryer, which matches my straightener. It seems to have a little less power than the one I had been using, though. It's really light, which makes it easy to use, and I like the three temps. I'd like the switch to flick up and down rather than side to side. Overall, a solid choice for a dryer at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: The wife likes it
customer_reviews.text: My wife used this same dryer model for a long time. It finally gave out and she wanted the same one. Not wanting her to be distressed, why buy one when you can buy two, so I did. She likes it and that is all that counts.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like to share dryer a lot I recommend it's long & is great for people with long hair so it won't get sucked & burnt up by the motor.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Cuneo

customer_reviews.title: This  Dryer is worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it looks. It is light weight, and comfortable to hold. the attachments snap onto the dryer end instead of being pushed on the outside of the dryer. They stay on until you want to remove them. The speeds and heat settings work very well together for your best results. The cold shot is good to have also. All around Great Dryer!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Slow Drying
customer_reviews.text: Takes a lot longer to dry my hair than the old dryer that had same wattage. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Williams

customer_reviews.title: It's good not great
customer_reviews.text: It's good not great. The turn on switch is damaged so now as soon as I pluge it starts working which is not ideal
customer_reviews.author: Tathiana

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: All very well with the Product, Thank you very much
customer_reviews.author: Milton Riaño

customer_reviews.title: Nice dryer
customer_reviews.text: Got this one for my mother-in-law and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: A. Antonidis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as well as any of my previous hairdryers. The attachments are a little hard to put on or take off though.
customer_reviews.author: dboni

customer_reviews.title: Love the sparkles
customer_reviews.text: Not too heavy. Great price and I love the color
customer_reviews.author: RayleesMommy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it! But it broke like a year later. Was disappointing with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bertha

product_meta.title: REMINGTON D5950 Ultimate Smooth Dryer, 3 Heat + 2 Speed Settings + Cool Shot, Black/Purple
product_meta.description: The REMINGTON Ultimate Smooth Dryer is loaded with technology. Titanium keeps heat consistent for fast drying, an ion generator reduces frizz and static*, and ceramic helps prevent damage. Combine that with a range of heat and speed settings and useful attachments, and it’s easy to find the performance you prefer when drying and styling your hair. *vs. standard Remington dryer
feature_bullets: Titanium Technology - The dryer is made with titanium, an exceptional heat conductor that helps deliver constant high temperatures for fast drying and a beautiful shine
Ionic Technology - The built-in ion generator creates negative ions to infuse moisture into the hair, reducing frizz and static*
Ceramic Technology - The ceramic-coated grill produces infrared heat to dry hair quickly and help prevent damage
1875W Max Power: Dry hair fast with 1875 watts max power
3 Heat + 2 Speed Settings + Cool Shot: Find the heat and airflow you prefer for your hair type, then use the cool shot button to lock in your gorgeous style

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
